attributes.action: Stop the expansion of the ULEZ to North and South circulars.
attributes.additional_details: Not everyone can afford a car that meets emission requirements to enter a congestion zone without paying the ULEZ charge. This is discrimination for people with low incomes.
attributes.background: To stop expanding the ULEZ Zone.

rejection.details:
It has been reported that the UK Government has suggested that London's congestion zone be extended, but doing so would be a matter for the London Assembly and the London Mayor.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

The latest Government bailout does not include any requirement to extend the congestion zone: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-bailout-to-keep-london-transport-running

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign: 

Remove conditions to increase fares and congestion charge for any TFL bailout: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555491
